title: [Medicine] The in‐ICU mortality of 41.6% from COVID‐19 is higher than usually seen in ICU admissions with other viral pneumonias, finds a new meta‐analysis (n=10,150). As the pandemic has progressed the reported ICU mortality rates from coronavirus have reduced from above 50% to close to 40%.
[Social Science] Pandemics & propaganda: how Chinese state media creates and propagates Chinese Communist Party coronavirus narratives
